description:
iView Labs is a full-service development firm, focused on creating beautiful products for start-ups and established enterprises. We specialize in the agile development of iOS, Android, Windows, and HTML5 applications in addition to CRM and ERP suites. Since 2012, our team of award-winning technologists & Designers have delivered over 70 software solutions to our ambitious clients in industries such as Healthcare, Logistics, Travel and Retail. 

We have a proven record of generating game-changing value for clients by offering them a product think tank from ideation to scale along with the development. 
• We helped Plexus Professionals Network acquire 3M doctors.
• We helped Urb-Ride to have 100 Rides per day.
• We helped Istanbul Kral to aggregate 10M Hotels & Flights Data
• We helped Lexcorp to scale over to 1M transactions in value.
• We helped Airmed Pathlabs to secure 2 M funding.
With iView Labs, you will get design thinking, innovation, differentiation and tech strategies to accelerate your business. We have a product and user first approach in all we do. iView Labs is a multidisciplinary shop that works with many modern frameworks to get things done right..
